url.title: URL
url.description: Full Daktela instance URL (e.g., https://mycompany.daktela.com). Either URL or Server is required.

server.title: Server
server.description: Daktela server name (e.g., mycompany). Will be converted to https://mycompany.daktela.com. Either URL or Server is required.

from.title: From Date
from.description: Start date for data extraction. Supported formats: 'today' or '0' (current time minus 30 minutes), negative integer (e.g., '-7' for 7 days ago), or 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

to.title: To Date
to.description: End date for data extraction. Supported formats: 'today' or '0' (current time minus 30 minutes), negative integer (e.g., '-1' for yesterday), or 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

tables.title: Tables
tables.description: Select tables to extract from Daktela.

incremental.title: Incremental Load
incremental.description: If enabled, new data will be appended to existing tables. If disabled, existing data will be replaced.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable verbose logging for debugging purposes.
